pages.text: $(li)The Riptide enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:weapons/trident)Trident$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment allows the trident to launch you forwards while you are in contact with Water, this includes Rain.
pages.title: Riptide

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_riptide)Ancient Tome (Riptide)$(/l).
